name: Full Metal Cannon
description:
A roguelike shoot 'em up arcade game with lots of fun power ups!

Can you defeat all the waves of ships, and the final boss, using your trusty cannon and some OP power ups?

Play in Fullscreen.

Only playable on Firefox, Chrome, Edge or Safari.

Music by Composite DnB
Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/compositednb
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/compositednb/

Most SFX courtesy of Composite DnB.
Some additional sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com

My socials:
